mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT C.CARDSEQ, C.CARDTITLE, C.CARDCONTENT, C.USERSEQ, C.CARDREADCOUNT, C.CARDDATE, C.CARDFILENAME, C.CARDDEL, U.NICKNAME, CF.LIKECOUNT, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(CC.PRODUCTSEQ), 0) FROM CARD_COORDINATES CC WHERE C.CARDSEQ=CC.CARDSEQ(+) GROUP BY CC.CARDSEQ) AS TAGCOUNT FROM CARD_COLLECTIONS C, USERS U, (SELECT CARDSEQ, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) LIKECOUNT FROM CARD_FAVORITE GROUP BY CARDSEQ) CF WHERE C.USERSEQ=U.USERSEQ AND C.CARDSEQ=CF.CARDSEQ(+) ORDER BY C.CARDDATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCTSEQ, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTCONTENT, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTDISCOUNT, PRODUCTMAKER, PRODUCTFILENAME, PRODUCTRATING FROM PRODUCTIONS
WHERE PRODUCTNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
ORDER BY PRODUCTNAME
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CARD_COORDINATES WHERE CARDSEQ=#{cardSeq} AND PRODUCTSEQ=#{productSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTIONS(PRODUCTSEQ, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTCONTENT, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTDISCOUNT, PRODUCTMAKER, PRODUCTFILENAME, PRODUCTRATING, PRODUCTDATE) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productContent}, #{productPrice}, #{productDiscount}, #{productMaker}, #{productFileName}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTSEQ FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCTIONS ORDER BY PRODUCTDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
